DOC.brief_summary: This Phase I/II study evaluate safety immunogenicity LC16m8 , modify vaccinia vaccine . After consent thorough screening ( include safety lab , EKG , medical history ) , healthy , previously unvaccinated volunteer age 18-34 receive single vaccination either LC16m8 current US-licensed smallpox vaccine , Dryvax . Volunteers blindly randomize treatment group 4:1 ratio ( 4 LC16m8 1 Dryvax recipient ) . Follow-up clinical evaluation , laboratory testing , EKGs cardiac assessment do regularly schedule follow-up visit 1 year vaccination .
